resources.string: With this App you can experience the art object by simply using your touchscreen. See what happens when you touch on different parts of the object on your mobile device.
What Do You Think About the Object?
What Do You Think About The Exhibition?

Madeline Charlotte Moorman (November 18, 1933 â€“ November 8, 1991) was an American cellist, performance artist, and advocate for avant-garde music. Referred to as the "Jeanne d'Arc of new music," she was the founder of the Annual Avant Garde Festival of New York and a frequent collaborator with Korean artist Nam June Paik.(From Wikipedia)
